sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './AppointmentList.css'; import AppointmentPopUpModal from './AppointmentPopUpModal'; function AppointmentListRow({ profilePic, name, studentId, course, trimester, atttendance, mentalHealth, address, date, time, title }) { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const closeModal = () => { setIsOpen(false); document.getElementById('root').style.overflow = 'auto'; // Enable scrolling on the root element document.getElementById('AppointmentPopUpModal').style.overflow = 'hidden'; // Disable scrolling on the AppointmentPopUpModal element }; return (
{ setIsOpen(true) }}>
Name:
Student ID:
Course:
Trimester:
{name}
{studentId}
{course}
{trimester}

{date}

{time}

{title}
{closeModal}} date='02/03/2023' time='10:30AM' counsellor='Dr. Yao Chin Kuok' title='Feeling lost' />
) } export default AppointmentListRow
